title: ettanaiyO Aval
sahitya:
rAgA:  sAvEri   
  ettanaiyO Aval uraittiDa ETTilaDangumO eNNiDappOmO


anupallavi

  buddhi arinda nAL mudal paramanE bhaktiyAi unruru cittam vaitta enakku


caraNam 1    manmata kOTi svarUpan enru unnai maraigaL pugazhndiDak-kETTaduNDu
 innuyirE unran vaNNat-tirumEni kaNDu kaLittiDa vizhaindaduNDu
    caraNam 2  			rAgA:  kEdAragauLaAa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  maraindirundE nI pozhindiDum karuNaiyil mUzhgi mUzhgi nAn tiLaittuNDu adu
 shurandiDum kamala nayanam iraNDaiyum kaNDu kali tIra ninaindaduNDu enak-
    caraNam 3  			rAgA:  AnandabhairaviAa:S G2 R2 G2 M1 P D2 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  abhaya karam koDuttu anbaraik-kAttiDum aNNal nI ena arindaduNDu
 ambuja padamalar aNDip-paNi sheidu anavaratamum undan aruginil irundiDa
